name: Anomaly (PsychoSystem32)
description: Suspense/Tension point-and-click game built in Unity 2D with inspiration taken from Alien (1979) and The Thing (1982) movies. The player takes the role of the captain of the spaceship Asterius and is tasked with discovering an alien Anomaly that has assumed the identity of one of the ship’s seven crew members. The player must rely on clues and events seen during each turn of gameplay to uncover the Anomaly’s identity and eradicate it. Anomaly is randomly chosen crew member each game, giving the player 30 turns to discover it.
